item.title: World Map of Countries by CO2 Emissions per Capita from 1960 to 2014
item.description: These choropleth maps show CO2 emissions in metric tons per capita from 1960 to 2014 based on data from the Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center and Oak Ridge National Laboratory.

item.title: World Map of Countries by Forest Area Percentage of Land Area
item.description: These choropleth maps show the forest area percentage of land area for the world's countries from 1990 to 2016 based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization.

item.title: World Map of Intentional Homicides
item.description: A series of geographic Choropleth maps showing the number of intentional homicides by country per 100,000 people. Created using World Bank data and D3.js.
